title: Sister O'dell, Roscoe Wallace, Jussie Smollett, Couples Arguments and more.
itunes:title: Sister O'dell, Roscoe Wallace, Jussie Smollett, Couples Arguments and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve is living his best life. There is no time like the present. Sister O'dell and Roscoe Wallace are in the room together. Jussie Smollett faces 3 years in state prison for lying to police. Presidential hopeful Michael Bloomberg has audio resurface from 2013. Steve tells us how to spend $500 for Valentine's Day. The talk about the takeaways from the New Hampshire Primary. What activity always leads to an argument between you and your significant other? Today we wrap up the show with Tommy as he talks about hot flashes, sweaty time and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
